titleInfo.title: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch - 1949-01-01 - Part 1 (start missing)

mods.abstract: Gene Autry's Melody Ranch, originally broadcast 1949-01-01 (part 1) over the CBS network. Featuring Gene Autry, Johnny Bond, Pat Buttram, the Cass County Boys, the Pinafores, Carl Cotner, with announcer Lou Crosby and special guest Jack Benny. Sponsored by Wrigley's Gum. Recording on disc starts approximately 7'50" into original broadcast.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
